A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Let me just preface this by saying that I thought The Force Awakens and Rogue One were fine/good. I didn't leave the theatre feeling like I had thrown up in my mouth multiple times like I did with the Last Jedi. The writing and story line were so incredibly cheesy. I just couldn't get over it\, it was like the writer and director had never seen a Star Wars movie in their lives. Totally different feel from The Force Awakens and Rogue One. Very\, very\, very disappointed in this movie\, it sucks!
